import React, {useState} from 'react' function AddProduct() { const [title, setTitle] = useState("") const [file, setFile] = useState("") const [preview, setPreview] = useState("") const loadImage = (e) => { const image = e.target.files[0] setFile(image) setPreview(URL.createObjectURL(image)) } return (
setTitle(e.target.value)}/>
{preview ? ( ) : ( "" )}
) } export default AddProduct
